steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2jumk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cthe0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"90qid","text":"Euthanize mice via CO2 or isoflurane inhalation and cervical dislocation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":21,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"},{"length":5,"offset":158,"style":"italic"},{"length":9,"offset":172,"style":"sup"},{"length":9,"offset":200,"style":"sup"},{"length":2,"offset":276,"style":"sup"}],"key":"44qna","text":"Note: For mouse bone marrow-derived macrophage (BMDMs) primary cultures, each experiment involved age and sex matched C57BL/6 mice between 3-9 months of age. Lrrk2KO (Lrrk2tm1.1Mjff) and G2019S (Lrrk2tm1.1Hlme) homozygous knockin mice were obtained from The Jackson Laboratory76. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ud4d","text":"Collect femurs and flush cavities with   ice-cold PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ugd1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"73B42010FA2211ED88E9C33DA525E9D0","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85rll","text":"Then, collect bone marrow cells by centrifugation  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6mk04","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"0.3","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"794FD320FA2211ED88E9C33DA525E9D0","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1p16k","text":"Resuspend the resulting pellet and differentiate for 6 days in culture media containing: DMEMF12 supplemented with 20% FBS, 20% L929 conditioned media, 1% penicillin-streptomycin and 1% GlutaMAXTM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":194,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
